is it possible to back up the terminal history when upgrading
the bash history is saved in .history
the history file is normally not worth worrying about. :)
since each shell can change it.. it can be in quiet a state of flux
that file can get overwritten at any time.
if you have 2 terminals open and do different commands in each one.. then close each one.. which one save4s the history? :)
dont depend on anything in  the history 'staying' there
in fact as each shell closes it writes to the .bash_history so whatever shell closes last gets 'saved'
